properties.entry: INSERT INTO PROJECT ( PROJECT_ID, CLIENT_ID, REQUIRED_SKILL, PROJECT_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PROJECT_STATUS, EXPECT_START, EXPECT_END, MEANS_OF_PAYMENT, MIN_BID, MAX_BID, START_BID, END_BID, COUNT_BID, AVERAGE_BID, WINNER_ID, WINNING_BID, START_DATE, END_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL )
INSERT INTO PROPOSAL ( PROPOSAL_NO , PROPOSAL_INFO , PROPOSAL_PRICE , PROPOSAL_START , PROPOSAL_END ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? );
